name: Corners - Dot Racer
description:
You're just a little dot in a big world.

This game is simple, but challenging and addicting. Perfect for passing the time!

Simply tap to turn the corner... but pay attention, because you don't know which way the dot will go!

See how long you can last as your speed increases.

Collect keys along the way to unlock more challenging tracks!

13 Levels in all, including Night Mode for an even more challenging experience.

Are you a dot racing champion? Download now and find out!
